                           +----org.webmacro.datatable.SimpleDataTable
public class SimpleDataTable
extends ArrayList
implements DataTable
a simple implementation of the DataTable interface for managing a list of SimpleTableRow objects.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Keats Kirsch
Since:
11-Sep-00
